mapper.select: select memberid "memberid", customerno "customerno", membertype "membertype", membername "membername", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", mobile "mobile", remark "remark", isauth "isauth", isinvite "isinvite", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime" from cas.organ_member where memberid = #{memberid} for update

select memberid "memberid", customerno "customerno", membertype "membertype", membername "membername", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", mobile "mobile", remark "remark", isauth "isauth", isinvite "isinvite", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime" from cas.organ_member where memberid = #{memberid}

select memberid "memberid", customerno "customerno", membertype "membertype", membername "membername", certificatetype "certificatetype", certificateno "certificateno", mobile "mobile", remark "remark", isauth "isauth", isinvite "isinvite", insertdate "insertdate", inserttime "inserttime", updatedate "updatedate", updatetime "updatetime" from cas.organ_member where memberid = #{memberid}
mapper.insert:
insert into cas.organ_member( memberid,customerno,membertype,membername,certificatetype, certificateno,mobile,remark,isauth,isinvite, insertdate,inserttime,updatedate,updatetime ) values
( #{item.memberid, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.customerno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.membertype, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.membername, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.certificatetype, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.certificateno, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.mobile, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.remark, jdbcType=CLOB},#{item.isauth, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.isinvite, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.insertdate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.inserttime, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.updatedate, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{item.updatetime, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
